reviewText: It would have. Only if I had noticed it wasn't in English.
I don't know how it was. It won't play in my player
This edition is not able to be viewed outside of Germany.  I wish that this had been stated in the description!!!
Doesnt work on DVD players made in the us but works on my laptop
Why is this not released on DVD OR BR in the US?! Its a good film that others would enjoy here. Someone please get it out there!
It was a good movie. A bit slow in spots but not sure why it was not released in US. Worth a watch.
